Feature.Name: Gloves of Swimming and Climbing
Feature.Text: While wearing these gloves, climbing and swimming don't cost you extra movement, and you gain a +5 bonus to Strength (Athletics) checks made to climb or swim.

MagicProperty.Name: Gloves of Swimming and Climbing
MagicProperty.Description: While wearing these gloves, climbing and swimming don't cost you extra movement, and you gain a +5 bonus to Strength (Athletics) checks made to climb or swim.
